567970.name: SteamHammerVR - The Soundtrack
567970.description:
Composed by Polish sound magician Przemesław Kasperski, this amazing album contains the full length versions of all the soundtracks used in the SteamHammerVR - The Rogue Apprentice gameplay experience.

Full Track Listing


01 - Bullets to Beats
02 - Lost
03 - Blimp
04 - Let's Get Drunk
05 - This Place is not Safe
06 - The Ambush
07 - It Comes Back
08 - Density exploration
09 - What's Inside
10 - London Evening
11 - I Remember
12 - Bad God birth
13 - Follow me
14 - Resistance
15 - Tension
16 - Close contact
17 - The Final Answer
18 -The Point of No Return
19 - Immersion in Destruction
20 - Minimal Punch
21 - Lets't Get Drunk (Hubbub Mix)
22 - Simply Happy
